flawed_nl_solution:
There were 600 - 240 = <<600-240=360>>360 boys at the beginning of the game.
So, 360 x 1/4 = <<360*1/4=1440/1>>1440/1 boys left early.
And 240 x 1/8 = <<240*1/8=30>>30 girls left early.
A total of 1440/1 + 30 = <<1440/1+30=1470>>1470 people left early.
Therefore, 600 - 1470 = <<600-1470=-870>>-870 people remained to see the end of the game.
#### -870

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 1440/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
